question: On treating 100 mL of 0.1 M aqueous solution of the complex <katex>$CrCl_{3}.6H_{2}O$</katex> with excess of <katex>$AgNO_{3}$</katex>, 2.86 g of AgCl was obtained. The complex is:
explanation: Moles of Complex = 0.1 * 0.1 = 0.01 mol. Moles of AgCl = 2.86/143.5 = 0.02 mol. Ratio 1:2. So 2 Cl- ions are outside the coordination sphere.
